name: Schuttelaar & Partners
goal:
As a communications consultancy, Schuttelaar & Partners strives to promote greater health and sustainability. To do so, we rely on a combination of science, social dialogue and good sense to help our clients build public support for sustainable innovations in nutrition, agriculture and human health.
